item.title: By: blink
item.dc:creator: blink
item.description: i saw the misfits in 79 in leicester england supporting the damned and they blew me away,then i saw them again in the mid 90s with michael graves singing and to be honest i thought he was on par with danzig,,but the the misfits now suck big time they are a pale immitation of a once great band..enuff said..
item.content:encoded: i saw the misfits in 79 in leicester england supporting the damned and they blew me away,then i saw them again in the mid 90s with michael graves singing and to be honest i thought he was on par with danzig,,but the the misfits now suck big time they are a pale immitation of a once great band..enuff said..

item.title: By: Anonymous
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
item.description: Danzig sucks......So hardcore but get dropped with one punch. He's all about the money where as the rest were about the music.
item.content:encoded: Danzig sucks……So hardcore but get dropped with one punch. He’s all about the money where as the rest were about the music.

item.title: By: Brian
item.dc:creator: Brian
item.description: New Misfits fuckin suck. They sound like a bunch of new age bullshit compared to the Original...And Danzig is the fuckin best.
item.content:encoded: New Misfits fuckin suck. They sound like a bunch of new age bullshit compared to the Original…And Danzig is the fuckin best.

item.title: By: ausin
item.dc:creator: ausin
item.description: and i want to see you get up on stage at age 52 and sing your heart out for 4 hours straight fucking ass hole give some fucking credit for all he has done with his life you fucking asswipe
item.content:encoded: and i want to see you get up on stage at age 52 and sing your heart out for 4 hours straight fucking ass hole give some fucking credit for all he has done with his life you fucking asswipe
